long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Deadpool Bathing Live Wallpaper: Add a Splash of Humor to Your Chrome Tabs

Dive into Deadpool’s quirky world with Deadpool Bathing Live Wallpaper. This Chrome extension brings the antihero’s humor and unconventional style to each new tab, featuring a hilarious animated wallpaper that combines function with Deadpool’s signature attitude.

Features:

Animated Bathing Wallpaper: Enjoy a comical, animated scene of Deadpool in a bathtub, adding a unique vibe to your tabs.

Date and Time Display: Stay on track with a stylish, easy-to-read date and time.

Google Search Bar: Access Google search directly from your new tab.

Quick Site Shortcuts: Reach your favorite websites instantly with customizable shortcut icons.

With Deadpool Bathing Live Wallpaper, every tab becomes a moment of humor. Designed for fans who enjoy a blend of light-hearted fun and practical tools, this extension delivers a personalized, Deadpool-inspired browsing experience that’s both functional and fun. Open each tab to a refreshing, memorable scene—because with Deadpool, even a bath is an adventure!
